results.description: Thatcham Town hosted Salisbury in the FA Cup first qualifying round at Stacatruc Stadium - watch BBC Sport coverage.

results.title: Watch Thatcham Town v Salisbury live in the FA Cup first qualifying round

results.description: Amid boardroom chats about Novichok and comments about rubber suits, Salisbury FC are helping a city recover from an international scandal.
results.shortTitle: How Salisbury FC are offering a city relief from poisoning crisis
results.title: Salisbury FC: The non-league club offering a city relief from poisoning crisis

thumbnail.altText: Salisbury FC boss Steve Claridge and a police officer in a protective suit and mask in Salisbury

results.description: Salisbury boss Steve Claridge comes out of retirement at the age of 51 to play in a pre-season friendly against Portsmouth.
results.title: Steve Claridge: Salisbury boss plays against Portsmouth aged 51

results.description: Listen to live BBC local radio commentary of Saturday's games in the National League, National League North and FA Trophy.

results.description: Salisbury FC have reached a deal with the trustees of the Raymond McEnhill Stadium to return to the ground.
results.shortTitle: Salisbury agree Ray Mac ground deal
results.title: Salisbury FC agree return to Ray Mac stadium

results.description: Salisbury City has been placed in administration at the High Court after a application through creditors was granted.
results.title: Salisbury City administration application granted at High Court

results.description: Salisbury City are given two weeks to resolve their ongoing financial difficulties and avoid being wound up.
results.title: Salisbury City granted winding-up reprieve in High Court

results.description: Financially-troubled Salisbury City are told that their application to join the Wessex League has been rejected.
results.title: Salisbury City: Wessex League rejects club's application

results.description: A five-person consortium fail in their bid to assume ownership of former Conference club Salisbury City.
results.shortTitle: Group fails to take over Salisbury
results.title: Salisbury City: Consortium fails to take over demoted club

results.description: Salisbury City fail to overturn their demotion from Conference South, leaving the future of the club in doubt.
results.title: Salisbury City lose Conference expulsion appeal

results.description: The consortium attempting to take over Salisbury City look set to take their case to the High Court to secure ownership.
results.shortTitle: Salisbury battle set for High Court
results.title: Salisbury City ownership battle set for High Court

results.description: A takeover of demoted non-league side Salisbury City by a new consortium is yet to be ratified, reports BBC Wiltshire.
results.title: Salisbury City takeover not cleared, authorities confirm

results.description: Ex-Portsmouth striker Steve Claridge is in talks with non-league Salisbury regarding their vacant managerial position.
results.shortTitle: Claridge in talks over Salisbury job
results.title: Steve Claridge enters Salisbury City manager talks

results.description: Outail Touzar's ownership of Salisbury City is overturned and the Whites are taken over by a new consortium.
results.title: Salisbury City: Demoted club taken over by consortium

results.description: Plymouth Argyle sign goalkeeper James Bittner from demoted non-league side Salisbury City on a one-year contract.
results.title: James Bittner joins Plymouth Argyle from Salisbury City

results.description: Salisbury City are expelled from the Football Conference after failing to pay a 50,000 bond and football creditors.
results.title: Salisbury City: Football Conference expel struggling club

results.description: Conference Premier side Woking sign midfielder Theo Lewis following his departure from troubled Salisbury City.
results.title: Theo Lewis: Woking sign Salisbury City midfielder

results.description: Conference Premier side Woking sign defender James Clarke following his departure from troubled Salisbury City.
results.title: James Clarke: Woking sign Salisbury City defender

results.description: Bristol Rovers sign midfielder Stuart Sinclair on an undisclosed contract from struggling Salisbury City.
results.title: Stuart Sinclair: Bristol Rovers sign Salisbury midfielder
